Comment: Most people would choose a million for themselves now, but 5000/mth for their children.  They think they can probably earn more than 6% per annum, but their kids won't.

A million in cash could down pay a nice decent commercial freehold property, with the potential for appreciation and term loan for cash withdrawal and longterm cashflow.  With a purchase quantum of 3m.  Definitely cash now instead of 5k for our children.  The 5k in 20-30years would mean even lesser purchasing power then.
